Uses of Class
fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent

  • Packages that use AbstractComponent 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs.components  
    fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components
    Components for the dynamic client/server example The dynamic client/server example uses three components: DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamic version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter provides a filtering component that behaves as a sensor so that sensor clients need not know whether they are connected to sensors or filters.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge
    Component and port for gauges The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge provides a gauge component used to display value read from a sensor.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng
    Interfaces for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng/code> defines two kinds of random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor provides a sensor simulator component and its port used to offer its service.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.examples.arrayBlockingQueue.components  
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components
    Le SynchronizerManager et le DistributedSynchronizerManager vont assurer la création de composants de synchronisation, présents dans le package fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components.syncTools.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.components.syncTools
    Composants/outils de synchronisation, offrant des services parfois bloquant afin de permettre à des composants clients de se synchroniser entre eux.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.delegates
    Component assemblies for both single computer and distributed deployments.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicComponentCreator
      The class DynamicComponentCreator defines components that will be automatically added in each of the sites of a distributed component assembly to allow for the dynamic remote creation of components on the virtual where the component is running.

      The class URIConsumer implements a component that gets URI from a URI provider component.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs.components 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicAssembler
      The class DynamicAssembler implements a compoennt that creates the other components of the dynamic connection example, makes them interconnect, and starts them.
      class  DynamicURIConsumer
      The class DynamicURIConsumer is the dynamic version of the component URIConsumer of the basic client/server example.
      class  DynamicURIProvider
      The class DynamicURIProvider implements the dynamic version of the URIProvider component of the basic client/server example.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Filter
      The class Filter defines components that can be put between a sensor and a sensor client to smooth the values of the sensor.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Gauge
      The class Gauge implements a component that pulls data through some sensor data required interface to display them.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NormalRNGenerator
      The class NormalRNGenerator implements a component that generates N(0, 1) random numbers and provides this service through a data offered interface called RNGDataOfferedI.
      class  UniformRNGenerator
      The class UniformRNGenerator implements a component that generates U(lowerBound, upperBound) random numbers and provides this service through a data offered interface called RNGDataOfferedI.

    • Uses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor

      Subclasses of AbstractComponent in fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SensorSimulator
      The class SensorSimulator implements an active component of type RNGProducerI offering a random number generation service through a data offered interface RNGDataOfferedI Description The component uses two RNGProducer components and a component to produces its random numbers by the sum of two random numbers generated by its inner producer components.
